user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send me (selectionsyndicate@techforward.com) an update on the candidate assessments and check her Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Updated Candidate Assessments

Hi Jane,

Could you please send the Selection Syndicate (selectionsyndicate@techforward.com) the latest update on the candidate assessments at your earliest convenience? When you get a moment, please also check your Notion workspace for any additional information that might be relevant.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
The Selection Syndicate

final_output:
